Welcome.title: Welcome to Foresight
Welcome.content: With the advent of novel technologies, our approach towards problem-solving is undergoing a paradigm shift, enabling more profound and multifaceted analyses. Our early attempt of NLP-pipeline prototype for GPHIN Next Generation represents an initial foray into leveraging technology for public health surveillance, yet it merely skims the surface of potential applications. Current capabilities extend far beyond, with the capacity to process from seven thousand to millions of articles and billions of data points every day, highlighting the critical need for automation and efficiency enhancement in data processing and analysis.

SidePanel.title: The Side Panel
SidePanel.content:
This is the side panel where you can read and interact with news clusters and articles.

Articles are clustered by similarity while cluster titles and summaries are auto generated by AI modules.

Within this panel you can choose a cluster or locate it within the graph (more on later slides).

SearchAndFilter.title: Search and filter functions
SearchAndFilter.content: You can search for certain keywords and specify a date and time span that you are interested in.

KeywordSearch.title: Keyword Search
KeywordSearch.content: If you wanted to search for pneumonia for example, you would enter it here. You can search for multiple keywords simultaneously by pressing enter between them.

KeywordSearchBoolean.title: Keyword Search
KeywordSearchBoolean.content: By default clusters or articles containing any of your search terms will be highlighted. If you want to only highlight those matching all the terms, select this box.

DatePicker.title: Date Picker
DatePicker.content: You can use this button to select which day you want to work with. You can travel back in time to see how to news appeared on January 6th, 2020 for example.

History.title: Time Span
History.content: Certain dates include the ability to examine the growth of clusters over a period of time. This prototype includes 3 and 7 day views for January 6th, and a 30 day view for January 29th. We will choose 3 days for this example.

FilterViewIntro.title: Filter View
FilterViewIntro.content: You can see the article count has changed based on our search criteria, however not all health threat categories are currently visible. We can modify the selected categories by clicking on the Filter View button.

FilterViewSelectThreat.title: Filter View
FilterViewSelectThreat.content: Here you can see all the relevant public health threats that are being detected. We are interested in only a certain few. We are going to add Unrecognized health risks.

ClusterGraph.title: Cluster Graph
ClusterGraph.content:
Here we can see the cluster view update based on our search criteria. In this view we can see the relevant articles and how they relate to each other based on our keyword search, the specified date and the selected health threats.

We will explore this graph more in later steps.

GraphViews.title: Graph Views
GraphViews.content: You can change how the graph is displayed using different layouts. A map view is also available which will display the clusters on a world map.

CollapseAllIntro.title: Graph Views
CollapseAllIntro.content: These allow you to re-apply the selected layout, expand all articles and collapse all articles.

CollapseAll.title: Graph Views
CollapseAll.content: By default, all articles are expanded. This button collapses the articles leaving only the news article clusters, the hierarchical clusters, and the public threat categories visible.

ArticleClusters.title: Article Clusters
ArticleClusters.content: On the side menu we can see the clusters sorted by size. You can locate any cluster on the graph by using the locate button.

ExpandClusterIntro.title: Cluster
ExpandClusterIntro.content: You can also double click on cluster nodes to expand its contents.

ExpandCluster.title: Cluster
ExpandCluster.content: Articles within article clusters are always represented by green circles, and light green for outliers.

ClusterGrowth.title: Cluster Growth
ClusterGrowth.content: Here we can examine the evolution of a cluster over time.

SelectedClusterIntro.title: Selected Cluster
SelectedClusterIntro.content: Here you can see the details about the cluster we have selected. A summary about the cluster and pre-determined questions and answers are provided just below the cluster summary.

ChatConsole.title: Chat Console
ChatConsole.content: Here you can ask your own questions to learn more about the cluster. The answers are provided by AI's understanding of the cluster.

EndOfTour.title: End of tour
EndOfTour.content:
This concludes our tour! If you would like to replay this tour you may do so through the Tour here.

Check back frequently as features and capability is continously being added to the tool.

WorkingWith.articles: You are working with {count, plural, =1 {one article} other {# articles}}.
WorkingWith.items: Found {count, plural, =1 {one relevant item} other {# relevant items}}.

Graph.expandArticles: Expand {type, select, hierarchicalcluster {articles along path} other {all articles}}
Graph.satelliteToggle: Toggle between satellite and terrain view
Graph.mapView: Toggle between map and graph view

SidePanel.panelTitle: {type, select, cluster {Selected Cluster} article {Selected Article} hierarchicalcluster {Clusters in hierarchy} threat {Clusters related to threat} other {Article Clusters}}
